page.title: 20Notable Residences
page.content: {Saltmarsh Hall:}The area around the hall is reputed to have been in the hands of the Saltmarsh Family at the times of the Normans.Sir Lionel Salt- marsh lived in the reign of Harold and after the conquest did homage to William.William gave him the Lordship of Saltmarsh.The present Hall is now owned by Mr&Mrs Philip Bean.The gardens are open to the Public occasionally. {Sand Hall:}It is a large brick building errected in 1774.It stands in a large,pleasant park.The estste is largely given over to raising cattle for milk and meat.The estate was once the home of the Schofield Family and the Viscis.It was also a hunting Lodge for the Kings of England. { The block surveyed by Staff and {Pupils of HOOK C of E FIRST SCHOOL. } ************
